titleStmt.title: A proclamation for a solemn national thanksgiving.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the second day of June, and of Our Reign, the fourth year, 1692.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
